camposdefutebol.py.data:
# coding: utf-8
area1 = float(raw_input())
area2 = float(raw_input())
area3 = float(raw_input())

campos1 = area1 / 4000
campos2 = area2 / 4000
campos3 = area3 / 4000

media =  (campos1 + campos2 + campos3) / 3

print "%.2f" %campos1
print "%.2f" %campos2
print "%.2f" %campos3
print "%.2f" %media
